paragraphs.title: Populate ActressesAndActorsDF Reference Data Created In Earlier Setup Reference Data Notebook
paragraphs.text:
val actressesAndActorsDF = sqlContext.sql("SELECT id, name, bio, img FROM actresses_and_actors_perm")
actressesAndActorsDF.show(30)

paragraphs.title: Most Influential Users By Like Graph
Run PageRank On The Like Graph And Enrich With Reference Data
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.graphx._
import org.apache.spark.graphx.util._

val edgeTuples = likesDF.map(like => 
  (like(0).toString.toLong, like(1).toString.toLong)
)

val convergenceThreshold = 0.01
val graph = Graph.fromEdgeTuples(edgeTuples, "", Some(PartitionStrategy.RandomVertexCut))
val pageRank = graph.pageRank(convergenceThreshold).cache()

val topInfluencers = pageRank.vertices.top(10)(Ordering.by(rank => rank._2))
val topInfluencersDF = sc.parallelize(topInfluencers).toDF("user_id", "rank")

val enrichedTopInfluencersDF = 
  topInfluencersDF.join(actressesAndActorsDF,
    $"user_id" === $"id").select($"id", $"name", $"bio", $"img", $"rank").limit(5).cache()
